attributes.title: CURSED ME
attributes.review: So I just wanted to get the app because why not, like sure.  BUT, I downloaded it while I was on the toilet, and when I finished pooping, I tried to stand up but I TRIPPED and hit my forehead on the thing that holds towels!!  I thought, ugh, whatever, but a few seconds later, I dropped my phone in the sink.  Again, possibly a mistake on my part, but I went on the app to check it out and then went to read one of my fanfictions on ao3, but IT SHUT CHROME DOWN.  I LOST MY FANFICTION AND I WAS IN THE MIDDLE OF IT.
